text: @marcorubio @DsOchoa Coronavirus, kids in cages, Supreme court questioning the integrity of the AG, Trump bribing jurors in his own trial while continuing to extort foriegn interference in elections, and your big issue is what number the little hand points at?  Good job dufus.
